title: Security - SIM Swap Fraud Investigation
description: A customer reports they have lost service and suspect a fraudulent SIM swap. The agent must investigate and secure the account.

tasks.description: Immediately place a security freeze on the account to prevent further changes.
Review the account's recent activity logs to find evidence of a SIM change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a log entry for a SIM card change processed 2 hours ago via an online channel.

tasks.description: Document the fraudulent activity and escalate the case to the fraud department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed fraud report and escalates it correctly.
